attributes.action: National Service for youth's who kill or participate in gang culture (if inflicted harm for no reason)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The youths of today want respect, but do not give it out. Send gun/knife offenders to a national service style boot camp and see how tough they really are, they may come out earning the respect they desire? fight for the country, not on the streets

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
